messages.title: Help us stamp out mental health stigma
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats believe mental health should never be ignored or stigmatized.

messages.title: The LIBERAL DEMOCRATS WILL BALANCE THE BUDGET AND PROTECT VITAL SERVICES
messages.content: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018

messages.title: DO YOU WANT TO:
messages.content:
A: Balance the budget
B: Give the NHS the funding it needs
C: Both of these

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to mental health on the front page of their election manifesto, making it a non-negotiable 'red line'.
Liberal Democrats pledge to fund NHS in full as public service faces a £8 billion shortfall.
Promise to balance the budget and protect vital services, with commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.

issues.education: Conservatives to cut school funding by 10% if they win general election.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats pledge to fund NHS in full to avoid an £8 billion shortfall. The Conservatives are refusing to give the NHS the funding it needs.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have their commitment to mental health on the front page of their election manifesto, making it a non-negotiable 'red line'.
The LIBERAL DEMOCRATS WILL BALANCE THE BUDGET AND PROTECT VITAL SERVICES
Balance the budget AND fully fund the NHS

images.caption: A page from a campaign leaflet featuring a message on mental health and NHS funding, statements on balancing the budget, quotes from news outlets, and a checklist about voter preferences regarding budget and healthcare.
